name: single-page-aplication-spa-ts-live-server

scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -u 1 src/index.html build/src/assets && copyfiles -u 2 src/assets/style.css node_modules/papaparse/papaparse.min.js build/src/assets

description: This framework allows you to practice developing SPA webpages in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and TypeScript.
